title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
After another injury to Anthony Davis, Colin believes it's time to shake things up as the Lakers are destined to be a fringe playoff team despite LeBron James playing at a MVP level. He calls out this head coach in the NFL that everyone claims is "elite" when he's not after taking a closer look. He discusses Jim Harbaugh's future following his contract extension with Michigan and why he's a much better fit in college football over the NFL. Plus, Super Bowl Champion Andrew Whitworth joins the show fresh off the Rams championship parade and sharing what made this Rams team special. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
